participant_1.name: Alex Taylor
participant_1.background: I am a creative person from the Midwest who loves to make clothes and play music. I'm smart too. I do arts and crafts to keep my mind sharp and active. Grandpa takes me to get ice cream. I am not married, but I am going to a pride parade with my friends this weekend!

participant_2.name: Morgan Smith
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful, nurturing, and enjoys the simple pleasures of life.
participant_2.background: I love to watch mystery movies when I'm not baking. I like to plant flowers in my gardens. My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food. I prefer a nice glass of wine with my cheese platter. I live in North Dakota.

content.text: Hi! I'm good, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm doing well! I'm excited to go to the pride parade this weekend.
That sounds like fun! I've never been to one before.
Oh, you should go! It's a great time to celebrate the LGBTQ community.
I will! I'm sure it will be a lot of fun.
I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to make clothes and play music. I also like to do arts and crafts.
That sounds like fun! I like to watch mystery movies and bake.
Oh, I love mystery movies! What's your favorite one?
I don't know if I have a favorite, but I really like the ones with Agatha Christie.
Oh, me too! She's one of my favorite authors.
I'm glad to meet someone who likes the same things I do.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone with similar interests.
I agree! We should hang out sometime.
